headline: Pompeo endorses Rep. Ronny Jackson for reelection in Texas
author: Virginia Aabram
sentences: Former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo has endorsed a Republican congressman who first attained national prominence as former President Donald Trump's White House physician for reelection to Congress, adding to his roster of endorsements for the 2022 midterm elections.

Ronny Jackson, the physician to the president from 2013 to 2018, earned the former secretary's endorsement Tuesday as he runs for his second term as a representative from Texas's 13th Congressional District.

He has signaled he may be interested in running for president in 2024, having traveled to Iowa several times and ranked third in popularity for the next Republican nominee behind Trump and Florida Gov.
"From the battlefield in Iraq to the White House, and now in Congress, I have always been motivated to fight for American greatness so that future generations can experience it as we have."
"He is a true patriot dedicated to our shared mission of building a strong military, securing our borders, and defeating the radical Lefts socialist agenda.
He called for President Joe Biden to take a mental test to prove that he was capable of the office after being elected to the House of Representatives.
Ronny has what it takes to help Republicans win back the House in November, champion American values, and get our country back on track."
"Im proud to endorse Congressman Ronny Jackson, who is a fierce defender of our conservative values," Pompeo said in a statement.
Jackson thanked Pompeo for his support in protecting "American values from being trampled on by radical Democrats."
They are determined to remake our country in their socialist image, but I will not allow it," Jackson said.
While serving as a personal doctor to Trump, Jackson frequently attested to his health and mental acumen.
He is supporting Herschel Walker for Senate in Georgia and David McCormick for Senate in Pennsylvania.
Ron DeSantis in a straw poll at this year's Conservative Political Action Conference in Florida.
Pompeo has been vocal in endorsing candidates for the 2022 midterm elections.
